title: Jaredan, I demand ye spill yer secrets!
body: More specifically, Tobias' last name! If not, I'll send all me pirates after yer booty!

replies.body:
Sorry, but no. not right now. And please leave my booty alone.

Did it get uncomfortably warm in here?
Is it Fortune? I bet it's Fortune.
If you don't say it i will wet your socks! It will be extemelly unconfortable to feel all that water in your feet!
The "me" in this totally threw me off.
weps, was going to say be XD Edited.
Me too lol
Tobias Fate?
What if we made you cookies
Graves. He's actually a long-lost brother of Malcolm Graves.
My. God.

Riot stated that his name ends with an F. But they won't tell us anything other than that. Which means we might recognize the name. 
Now lets see, what other last names start with F. Ahah, his full name has to be, 
Tobias Fortune. Long lost brother of Sarah Fortune.
That'd be interesting, since "Twisted Fate" and "Fortune" seem like quite the antithesis.
Actually, Fortune means Fate traditionally in most languages including English. And it's also usually presumed to be *bad* fate.
It's FÃ¼nke.
I'll go with Tobias Faust.

>
> I'll go with Tobias Faust.

I thought it'd be "Fjord"
I choose Faust because of the character behind that name ;P
I'd Say Farnsworth... no wait, Finkleberry? hmm no, no... Fitzpatrick? Nah... Frobisher? Not likely... Hmmm...

Tobias Fazbear.

2spooky4u
Oh shi...

Who is Tobias? :/

EDIT: TF's real name is Tobias???? Awesome!!!!
